name: Peruvian Human Hair

Our Virgin Peruvian Hair is collected from a single donor and has not been chemically altered or processed. name: European Human Hair
description: Virgin European Human Hair is a very popular type of hair extensions in the market. It is extremely compatible with many hair types, including African-American and Caucasian. The hair works well with all hairstyles and holds curls beautifully. Our Virgin European Hair is collected from a single donor and has not been chemically altered or processed. It is Shed-Free and Tangle-Free, so you can rest assured that you are purchasing hair of excellent quality.

name: Indian Human Hair
description: Indian Virgin Human Hair is one of the silkiest types of hair we offer, yet it is so exceptional due to its versatility. The hair is naturally full and bouncy, and its texture is silky soft. It can easily be curled, waved/styled and does not tangle, shed excessively or lose its luster. We find that Indian hair matches brilliantly with sleeker, more silky hair types, or those with relaxed, pressed, or permed hair. Our Virgin Indian Hair is collected from a single donor and has not been chemically altered or processed. It is Shed-Free and Tangle-Free, so you can rest assured that you are purchasing hair of excellent quality.
